George Hunter Front End Web Design

I am a front end developer and designer, working on a variety of projects from websites to mobile applications. My main focus is building websites, taking responsibility for the vast majority of the development. This means building the front end in a scalable and performance orientated way: recreating the design so the website is as performant as possible.

Front End Development

I build the front end of websites and apps - responsible for everything from reporducing the design to managing performance and scalability

UX Design

I'm responsible for making sure that designs are both appealing and user friendly, whether that is driving sales or improving user experience

Application Development

I work on hybrid mobile applications - with input on UX design and responsible for view development
